price: Nta na kimwe mu biri mu birere no ku isi kizagera imbere ya (Allah) Nyirimpuhwe kitari umugaragu (uciye bugufi).
arabic: إِن كُلُّ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّآ ءَاتِي ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَبۡدٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: in kullu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi illā ātī al-raḥmāni ʿabdan
